name: Amit Awekar
content: Welcome to Home Page of Amit Awekar Welcome I am a faculty member in the Computer Science and Engineering Department of IIT Guwahati, Assam, India अथातो ब्रह्मजिज्ञासा : Now, Therefore, the Enquiry into Brahman [Curriculum Vitae] [Research Publications] [Research Group] [Food for Thought] E-mail Address [first name][last name]@gmail.com Postal Address Office Room Number 302, CSE Department, Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati, Assam, India 781039 Please note that this is my personal website.
